alert.note: Alert for Natrona County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 3:59PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Natrona County through 445 PM MDT... At 359 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Teapot Rock, or 29 miles northwest of Casper, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antelope Hills and Teapot Rock. This includes Interstate 25 between mile markers 202 and 219. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
